title: Healthcare Mobile App
description: A communication platform application that facilitates interaction between doctors and users makes it easy for the public to see their doctor at any time, as a solution to access health in a fast, accurate, safe and reliable way.
short_description: Mobile application that can be used by users to schedule doctor consultations and consult with doctors via video call.

goals.description: Designing applications that provide online consultations, presenting a list of doctors and their descriptions, arranging appointment schedules to make a summary of health history.
